summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Marginal Way, from West Spokane Street to a point about four hundred (400) feet north of the north margin of West Spokane Street, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6349 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
